languages.text: В зеленоватой жидкости плавает друкарская медуза — опасный паразит, что собирает в себя эмоции жертв.
Floating in the greenish liquid is a Drukhari medusae: a dangerous parasite that absorbs its victim's emotions.
languages.original_text: В зеленоватой жидкости плавает друкарская медуза — опасный паразит, что собирает в себя эмоции жертв.

traits.locale_text: Floating in the greenish liquid is a Drukhari jellyfish: a dangerous parasite that absorbs its victim's emotions.

languages.text: In der grünlichen Flüssigkeit treibt eine Drukhari-Medusae, ein gefährlicher Parasit, der die Emotionen seines Opfers absorbiert.
languages.original_text: Floating in the greenish liquid is a Drukhari medusae: a dangerous parasite that absorbs its victim's emotions.

traits.locale_text: In der grünlichen Flüssigkeit treibt eine Drukhari-Medusae, ein gefährlicher Parasit, der die Emotionen seines Opfers absorbiert.

languages.text: Une méduse drukhari flotte dans le liquide verdâtre. Ce dangereux parasite est connu pour absorber les émotions de ses victimes.
languages.original_text: Floating in the greenish liquid is a Drukhari medusae: a dangerous parasite that absorbs its victim's emotions.

traits.locale_text: Une méduse drukhari flotte dans le liquide verdâtre. Ce dangereux parasite est connu pour absorber les émotions de ses victimes.

languages.text: Suspendida en el fluido verdoso hay una medusa Drukhari, un peligroso parásito que absorbe las emociones de sus víctimas.
languages.original_text: Floating in the greenish liquid is a Drukhari medusae: a dangerous parasite that absorbs its victim's emotions.

traits.locale_text: Suspendida en el fluido verdoso hay una medusa Drukhari, un peligroso parásito que absorbe las emociones de sus víctimas.

languages.text: 漂浮在绿色液体之中的是黑暗灵族的美杜莎。这是一种危险的寄生生物，会吸收被寄生者的情感。
languages.original_text: Floating in the greenish liquid is a Drukhari medusae: a dangerous parasite that absorbs its victim's emotions.

traits.locale_text: 漂浮在绿色液体之中的是黑暗灵族的美杜莎。这是一种危险的寄生生物，会吸收被寄生者的情感。

languages.text: 緑がかった液体の中に浮かんでいるのは、デュカーリのメデューサ—犠牲者の感情を吸収する危険な寄生体だ。
languages.original_text: Floating in the greenish liquid is a Drukhari medusae: a dangerous parasite that absorbs its victim's emotions.

traits.locale_text: 緑がかった液体の中に浮かんでいるのは、デュカーリのメデューサ—犠牲者の感情を吸収する危険な寄生体だ。

languages.text: Kurbanının duygularını emen tehlikeli bir parazit olan Drukhari Medüzü, yeşilimsi sıvının içinde yüzüyor.
languages.original_text: Floating in the greenish liquid is a Drukhari medusae: a dangerous parasite that absorbs its victim's emotions.

traits.locale_text: Kurbanının duygularını emen tehlikeli bir parazit olan Drukhari Medüzü, yeşilimsi sıvının içinde yüzüyor.
